controllers
Class ClientThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      controllers.ClientThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ClientThread
extends java.lang.Thread

A Client thread handles stream input and output in two separate threads to allow for multi-client broadcasts and simultaneous reading and writing.

Author:
wouterken

processInput

public java.lang.String processInput(java.lang.String request)
                              throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                     java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                     java.lang.Exception
Attempt to process input from a client. If no input is passed, we assume the client has left and throw a ConnectException. Otherwise we parse and validate the input, and return a response.

Parameters:
request -
Returns:
Throws:
java.lang.InstantiationException
java.lang.IllegalAccessException
java.lang.Exception
